Simon's Trash

February 2020 - March 2020

Simon's Trash game in Lua and Solar2D

This project is my first attempt at game developement. Togheter with my collegues Francesco Carrabino and Daniele Passamonti, we devolped a mobile game inspired by the eco-sustainability theme for the game programming exam we did during our bachelor.

Written Report

Here you can find a report, written (in italian) by me and my collegues Francesco Carrabino and Daniele Passamonti, which contains a detailed explanation of the game works under the hood.

Game Preview

Here you can see a gameplay which shows how to play the game. The Android version of the game is free to download in apk format if you want to try it!

Contact Me

I check most frequently whatsapp telegram and email, but feel free to get in touch on the platform you prefer!
